2.0.name: wordpress/tt-subscribe
2.0.description:
This plugin is a simplified subscription box that is totally customizable. It currently includes facebook, twitter, google plus and feedburner. Other social media links will be included soon. Created by Thesabel Tuto.

NEW!!! Updates:

  1. Shortcodes: [tt_subscribe]
  2. Widget: TT-Subscribe
  3. Fixed layout on content area
  4. Customizable header color

Checkout this plugin's website: http://ttplugins.wordpress.com/

NOTICE FROM THE DEVELOPER

  1. If you want me to add more social media links here, please do suggest on the support area!
  2. If you do like this plugin, please do write a review!
  3. Thank you all for your patronage!
  4. This is a FREE PLUGIN!

DISCLAIMER AREA

Facebook Information: This plugin uses the current and simplified LIKE BUTTON of facebook.com. Security issues are handle
